fields.name: ConfirmRecordUpdateMessageCB
fields.fieldText:
Confirmation


You are about to update the following:

Record for kit: {!Enter_Kit_ID}

CB Bottle ID AST: {!varTScanCBBottle1}

CB Result AST: {!CB_Sterility_Result_AST}

CB Bottle ID NST: {!varTScanCBBottle2}

CB Result NST: {!CB_Sterility_Result_NST}


Click Update to save information.

screens.description: Confirm update confirm for the CT sample.
screens.name: Confirmation_Updated_Record_CT
screens.label: Confirmation Updated Record - CT

fields.name: RecordUpdateMessage_CBUpdate
fields.fieldText:
Record for kit: {!Enter_Kit_ID}


Has been updated with the following:


CB Bottle ID AST: {!varTScanCBBottle1}

CB Result AST: {!CB_Sterility_Result_AST}

CB Bottle ID NST: {!varTScanCBBottle2}

CB Result NST: {!CB_Sterility_Result_NST}


Click Add Another or Cancel above to Exit.
